import React, {useContext} from 'react' import GuestContext from './../../context/guestContext/guestContext' import guestContext from './../../context/guestContext/guestContext' const Guest = ({guest}) => { const {removeGuest} = useContext(guestContext) const {id, name, phone, dietary, isConfirmed} = guest //guest prop gets brought in and we assign vars from the prop const handleRemove = () => { removeGuest(id) } const handleUpdate = () => { } return (

{name}

{dietary}

{phone}

) } export default Guest
